doc:
Tony Marvin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Marvin 0 Tony Marvin (October 5, 1912 – October 10, 1998) was an American radio and television announcer. He became a staff announcer for CBS, and later became most known as the long-time announcer for Arthur Godfrey. Tony_Marvin ( October_5_,_1912 – October_10_,_1998 ) was an_American_radio_and_television_announcer . He became a_staff_announcer for CBS , and later_became most known as the_long-time_announcer for Arthur_Godfrey .
